website_summaries.verdict: Similar to our Best of the Best, this kitchen rug is luxuriously comfortable and does a great job of reducing pressure on the feet. However, some owners express concerns regarding durability.
pros: Thick cushioning is designed to reduce pressure on the feet, knees, and lower back by up to 32%
Features a leather-grain top for easy cleaning
Holds its shape and doesn't compress in a hurry
Comes in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Some complaints of the top layer peeling after a while

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat in 2017. It is already peeling all down the middle. A mat like this in normal home household use, should last at least 3 to 4 years. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Epal

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the other flatten fatigue mat that cost less. I splurged on this one and it is so cushy and elevated. Like standing on a cloud. This will help ease mine and my fiancé’s back pain. Helps my feet, ankles and hips too.
customer_reviews.author: Semper Fi, NY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to put in front of my kitchen sink to make washing dishes and prepping for meals a little more comfortable. They were exactly what I hoped for. Nice level of cushion, easy to clean, beveled edges are a nice touch to prevent tripping. I decided to buy 2 more mats as a gift to my mom for her kitchen because she spends long hours in the kitchen preparing meals for the extended family. When she got hers she said they were "heavenly". I am very happy with this product. After I bought these I saw a similar product at Bed Bath and Beyond, they were more expensive and thinner. I'm still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KimboS11ce

customer_reviews.title: My hips no longer hurt
customer_reviews.text: I love this new mat! I have bursitis in both hips and standing on a tile-covered concrete floor in our kitchen caused immense pain that lasted for days. This mat is firm but also cushions my hips, back and legs. It stays flat on the floor and does not move around. I like the beveled edges to minimize the trip hazard. I am much more comfortable cooking now. I am very pleased with this matt and can recommend it without hesitation. And yes, as others have mentioned it comes in a large cardboard box so as not to bend/fold the mat. We recycled the box. I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Attracts house pets.  Beware!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while and I wanted to give it time to be evaluated. It's a mat. It's soft and you can sink into it. It's easy to clean. It keeps the heels from aching after standing all day. But... on the downside, it attracts dogs. They love to lay on it and it's a pain to get them to move elsewhere. 100 bucks in sheepskin crate-liners and all she wants to lay on my mat instead. It is just not large enough to support an 80lb dog-carpet and at the same time offer any room to move around. It attracts cats too. I cannot get anything done with this thing near me. I may return it.
customer_reviews.author: lopocg

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest solution for a stand up job
customer_reviews.text: Bought a more expensive mat that I hated; it didn't help with pain relief at all. This mat was a good price and did exactly what I needed it to do. I still dislike standing all day, but at least I don't feel as sore anymore. Finally some relief for my feet, knees, and back!! Highly recommend. It is used in around chemicals and doesn't show signs of wear yet. (I did use a protective nano-spray on it before laying it down, and that has probably helped.)
customer_reviews.author: 2roos

customer_reviews.title: Foot relief
customer_reviews.text: I put this mat in the kitchen in front of the sink. My feet always ache on the hard tile floor when I use the sink. This mat is great, it is very soft and spongy, but my feet don’t sink down into it. It made a huge difference, my feet feel much better. It is soft yet firm enough that I don’t feel like it will trip me or that I’ll sink into it and my foot will stick. Tapered edges help transition from the floor onto the pad. Am going to buy another. Highly recommend for achy feet
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the product for one day but I love it. Excellent comfort for the price. I got two for my kitchen and one for my office standing workstation. I have noticed that I need to retrain my brain when walking toward or near the mat. When you are not used to the item in the area, it can be a slight stumble hazard (which might not be good for those who are not sure-footed). The beveled edges really help with that though. It just takes some getting used to. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase, customer service and quick shipping... (Amanda...buy this product! Lol.)
customer_reviews.author: HealthNut

customer_reviews.title: Saves my new wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Added dark stained wood floors, and was warned not to allow kitchen sink stuff (water, oil, waste) to stay on it. This was first of all a way to save the flooring (which it does well). I was pleased that it's easy to clean, and that it is comfortable while I'm busy at the sink , diswasher, or trash. The 60" long mat runds from the dishwasher, across the sink bottom, and into the garbage drawer, so it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Feels great underfoot.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. I bought one for quite a lot more money from another vendor that, while attractive in a pretty print, was nowhere near this cushioned and comfortable. That one was relegated to the utility room in the basement. This one is so thick and bouncy. It definitely makes standing in front of the sink a lot easier. I just wipe it down and it cleans up quickly. The red is more of a burgundy, which was a little disappointing as my kitchen accents are a true, bright red. I can live with it. Worth the money, unlike the first one I bought. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonmama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Support
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. BUY IT! Your whole body will thank you. It's not only soft, but the support to this mat is amazing. When I do dishes on it, I haven't had any discomfort at all. I usually get a little lower back pain or knee pain when standing in one spot. But for the past week, standing on this mat, nothing. Dirt comes off it with a damp paper towel swipe. Very easy. I wish I would have bought the bigger one , and I probably will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! I love the mat - my only push back is the color. The Navy Blue is not a true Navy Blue it’s more like a slate/mineral blue. It is pretty though and because I like the actual mat so much I decided to stick with it. Every kitchen, laundry room and craft room should have one of these......maybe more!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Bowditch

customer_reviews.title: Best anti-fatigue mat ever
customer_reviews.text: These mats are amazing! I’ve got 3 of them in my kitchen and my husband wishes we could cover the entire floor they are so comfortable! Very easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi2

customer_reviews.title: Great find- go bigger!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great modern looking kitchen mat. I love that it is solid without pattern. I ordered the smaller size first but with the angles on the edge it really make the usable part quite small so I returned and went up to 36" and it's perfect for in front of sink. If in between sizes, go up to the bigger size. The box that it came in could have fit a small lion but that's a packaging deal- whatever!
customer_reviews.author: SRE

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought it again!
customer_reviews.text: This is now my 3rd anti fatigue mat from Sky Solutions. I have one in my office for my sit/stand desk, and had an identical one in my kitchen. Bought 3 years ago, the surface of it developed some bubbles (hot spill? chemical leak?), and started to peel. So, time to get a new one and it never entered my head to order from anywhere else (still hoping for that whole kid named after me promise...)! Delivered promptly, in a box that will now double as a coffin! Yay, a double win!!
customer_reviews.author: Donnaj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic foot pain and standing to do tasks had become a problem, even with running shoes with orthotics in them. With this mat I am able to stand, even with bare feet, in great comfort. It is cushy but not too cushy, ie, it supports the feet well. I will buy more in the future, from this seller. This was very well worth the money at $20 for the black color mat. I am so happy to find something to help with foot health/comfort!! Actually, I am not in the habit of leaving reviews, but this mat makes a real difference in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Reader47

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use at the kitchen sink, a little foot and ankle relief while doing dishes and washing baby bottles. It’s very comfortable and easy to clean, just wipe with a wet cloth. Be sure to watch your foot-ware when stepping on it, I punctured a hole in my mother in laws rug with the high heel of my shoe...although I’m usually not wearing heels while doing the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doctor (mine) approved. quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two sizes; this one for in front of my stove. I chose this style for the cover texture. I chose the color red to match my red appliances and whatnot in the kitchen. The mat appears durable and is very comfortable under feet. My foot/ankle surgeon gave me an ultimatum, buy mats like these or start wearing shoes around the house. I had a doctor's visit with him and he was impressed with the quality of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you stand a lot in your kitchen, this mat is for you. It’s durable and firm. It has just enough give to make you feel comfortable...not unsupported. As someone with arthritic knees, these qualities are very important. The color is exactly what I thought it would be. I love my new mat!
customer_reviews.author: tmbouchillon

customer_reviews.title: I love doing dishes now!
customer_reviews.text: The Oasis Kitchen mats are awesome. I bought one to try and ended up buying two more. They are comfortable to stand on while doing dishes and or cooking. Very easy to clean. They added a nice touch of color (red) to my dull kitchen. I am 67 years old and the comfort of these mats, I do so appreciate. I recommend everyone to own one, two or three!
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home office
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate to buy this. I bought it because I’m working standing (computer work) part of the day. Standing on the bare floor was giving me back and foot pain. It’s perfect for home office. You can stand barefooted. I’m thinking about getting another one for my kitchen. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I stand on my feet a lot when I work... from home. This has helped alleviate much lower leg, ankle and feet aches! I wish I had purchased a larger size but the feel is great. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michele T

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relieving Mat
customer_reviews.text: I’m sooo glad that I found this mat in my color scheme. It is very comfortable standing on while washing dishes. My for is tiled and it’s hard on my feet and legs so the item works well to keep my back and feet from hurting. I thought it was a little pricey but for the comfort, it’s more value for the bucks!
customer_reviews.author: heave

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Mat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the mats in the burgundy-wine color and they look great. The mats are very soft and are great to stand on! The whole Amanda Hamilton thing is all pretty dumb and not sure how the company would ever dream the purchaser would understand who this person is and why you'd put some bizarre note with the mats. I don't even know the name of the manufacturer. Anyway, love the mats. Five stars except for "pain relief". I didn't buy the mats for pain relief. I just liked the color and quality I assumed I would get by reading about the product and reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Wade J

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one mat and it was great. It was very soft and comfortable and had plenty of give under my feet to prevent pressure when I stand in front of the kitchen sink for long periods. Four days later I ordered a second one to use in front of my bathroom vanity. It is not at all as soft and squishy as the first one. It is hard like the one I could have gotten for $10 less at the home improvement store. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Piggins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my neuropathy
customer_reviews.text: I have bad pain in my feet/legs from neuropathy at the moment and every time I walk by my kitchen sink I make sure to walk on this thing because its the most comfy surface in my house! We're gonna buy another one or two of these for stove/prep area. GF says it gets dirty and collects water spots super quickly. I haven't noticed as I can't bend down to clean floors at the moment but it only takes her a second to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: cyber5

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: I just got a standing desk and this mat is great! I was skeptical at first that it would be too cushy, but I think it's pretty perfect. It fits under my desk really well when I want to store it, it's a lovely blue (not navy but not electric either) and it was delivered flat, not folded. Minimal off-gassing when I opened it. I prefer to stand on it barefoot. I believe it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ange Ailesnoires

customer_reviews.title: Would Probably Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work (I stand all day). It’s not too thick, not too thin. It really does help! It’s a good cushion-ing material and I don’t really notice it while I’m using it, but I definitely notice if I don’t use it. I used to get pains around hours 5-7 of standing, but now it’s more like hours 8-12. It’s a bit pricey but overall I would probably invest in another one if needed!
customer_reviews.author: M Har

customer_reviews.title: Relief in a mat
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband’s elderly parents in new home with all laminate flooring. They didn’t expect the fatigue the flooring can cause as they prepare meals, put away groceries, etc. They love them! Their daughters as RA. After her visit, she’s buying these.
customer_reviews.author: snowycreekfarm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, very nice cushion
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cushion. I put one in front of my sink and one in front of the stove. The absence of any texture makes it super easy to keep clean. Love these mats! I added a photo of the back, since the seller did not include one.
customer_reviews.author: HomesteadShopper

customer_reviews.title: No fatigue.
customer_reviews.text: I'm single mommy so I stand alot. I am glad to have this in my Kitchen! I do want to rate 4.5 stars because it slides around, without much cause. But I feel it could be just my flooring or the fact that I do not have rug placements/holders. Otherwise, 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Shantelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended this mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving our mat so much that I bought a second one! It is the most comfortable mat to stand on & even makes doing the dishes a little more fun now that I can stand with ease! My husband commented how much he loves it too & that I should order the second one for the bottom of our stairway. So if our infant climbs up to the baby gate & falls she will land on this soft mat & not get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Jordan

customer_reviews.title: These things are sweet.
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is that I cannot buy one in a longer length (at least I haven't seen one... I am a bit lazy in my searching as well). Having only had them for a few days and not spent hours on them in the kitchen, I can't speak to their durability or their comfort over a full day. I can say that spending a couple hours on them is vastly superior to standing on a simple rug or bare tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: MADinVance

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, quality easy to transition onto
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 if these. Tried cheaper ones, no comparison. These are tough, easy to transition into from flat flooring, very good for standing at work station or in my kitchen when I stand and scrapbook at my kitchen counter. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Welty

customer_reviews.title: Great products, hilarious company
customer_reviews.text: Rarely am I so impressed with the company behind the products I buy. These folks are hysterical! From the moment of purchase, until these were on my front porch, I received several passionate pleas for my complete truthfulness and satisfaction. Love the rugs. Would totally buy from them again to prevent any employee becoming distressed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for standing desks!
customer_reviews.text: This has quickly become an essential in my home office. I love my standing desk but my office is all tile and I was beginning to experience hip pain from standing. I first tried a folded yoga mat but decided to upgrade to an anti-fatigue mat. WHAT A DIFFERENCE! I am so happy I switched, it takes the pressure off my feet, hips and back. My yoga mat is also much happier now that it is being used for its original intent. ;) I'd highly recommend this to anyone who has tile in their house, I might have to buy another one for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Green Estate

customer_reviews.title: Do not order black
customer_reviews.text: The price break was on the black. I knew better, but ordered it anyway. Impossible to keep clean. So far, the mats are holding up well and are cushy. We have cement floors, so they do not stay in place well.
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Immediate improvement in leg and foot discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from multiple back and leg/foot conditions and have been looking for a truly comfortable floor mat for my kitchen. Well, I am happy to say I found it in your product. The mat is soft and thick enough to sink your feet into and I already know from one day of use this was a wise purchase for me. I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something that was durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I was looking for a mat to replace my old gross fabric topped mat I was so sick of cleaning. I wanted something that was durable and easy to clean. That’s what I got. Anything I can easily wipe down without getting a gadget like a hand vacuum out for is an A in my book. It’s also super thick and comfy on my feet in front of the sink. I did not enjoy the excessive packaging it came in however. The box was big enough to fit a desk into.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: If you have pets order two!
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy a second one because one of my cats has decided that this is his bed. I have to stand with my legs on either end of him to use the kitchen sink! It is very comfortable for people to stand on and has held up extremely well. It wipes clean and has not shown any signs of wear and tear at all. We have had it about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Baroness of Sedona

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazingly comfortable to stand on while cooking, especially for a teacher who stands all day and has exhausted feet. I like the beveled edges so it is not a tripping hazard and will not roll up over time. It stays in place well and does it's job!
customer_reviews.author: G Rich

customer_reviews.title: Home Run for my FEET.....
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much.. I am absolutely satisfied with this mat which is not only for comfort but adds to improving health as it is better to stand and be active so it goes great with my Veradesk. I also love the upbeat, fun correspondence from the Sky Solutions team.. Now a days, Customer Service seems to be falling by the weigh-side so it is nice to add humor and a personal touch so thank you for making me smile as well.. WOW, my Smile was Fee..... Salute to the Sky Solutions team.. Sincerely.. Deborah.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: I received this mat a few days ago and am finding it most delightful as I stand to wash dishes. It feels good on my feet and that translates up my back relieving strain.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Secure Kitchen Floor Mat
customer_reviews.text: I love the new leather floor mat which is ideal for my kitchen. The old wool rug would slide from under me and curl up in all kinds of shapes. Almost fell on some occasions. Now the floor feels secure as I never have to worry about sliding, the mat looks attractive in the kitchen, and it is easy to clean. I recommend this mat highly.
customer_reviews.author: Loras Michel

customer_reviews.title: Like Standing On A Cloud
customer_reviews.text: We placed this is in front of our sink and my back has stopped killing me when we rinse/do dishes. I would like to walk on something like this all day. I plan to get a couple more for a few other spots on the kitchen tile.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cushy!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat to stand on while working in the kitchen! Super comfortable with tons of cushioned comfort. Great shade of blue, not too bright. Easy to clean too! I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to use at the office. I have switched from the typical desk to a standing desk, which has increased my work performance and overall well being at the office. This mat is perfect and very comfortable. It adds support to my feet and lower back, as to not feel fatigue. Great mat and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: atlcosta

customer_reviews.title: great mat for standing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat for standing and working. It has nice taper edges and is very comfortable to stand on. I actually ordered the wrong color but rather than return it, I used it in another spot where the color was good, and ordered another one in the correct color. Very nice mat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Pizzaman/Cook & have bad legs but your Mat brings sheer comfort to my 68 year old legs. Big Thanks & God Bless!!
customer_reviews.author: James M Codella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat for when I'm working at my kitchen island. I knew I would be spending a lot of time this year baking cookies. Previously, my back and legs hurt after a couple hours and I was exhausted. So far so good. The mat is comfortable and of course, I've had to clean up a spill and cleanup was easy. Shipping was quick but seriously, they need to get boxes that aren't 18 inches tall for a 3/4 inch mat! I'm glad that I finally bought one of these mats. 12/13/19
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA JACOX

customer_reviews.title: Anti-fatigue Mat Works
customer_reviews.text: The anti-fatique mat provides adequate cushioned support. I ordered the same mat in two different sizes, one for the stove and the other for the sink, and the same grey/grey color for both. However what I received was a lighter grey/grey and a darker grey/grey. This level of color detail was not provided in the product description thus the reason for 4-stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This mat provides comfort while we work in the kitchen. Very easy to clean, with a wet cloth. When we received the Mat, it did have a slight odor due to the fact that it was sealed in plastic. We aired it out for a couple of days and it was good to go! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this mat to fit under a very thin rug we got for the kitchen. It fit perfect under the rug and the sloping edges prevent a tripping hazard. Very nice to be comfy while standing in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Lemke

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MAT. THINKING OF MAKING MY WHOLE KITCHEN FLOOR JUST OF THESE MATS. JUST KIDDING. BUT THEY FEEL ABSOLUTELY GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Q.

customer_reviews.title: MUST buy!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo comfy to stand on! Instantly relieves pressure to my feet. Looks nice, and wipes down nicely. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Mellanee Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Thick,comfortable. Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable &thick. Good product works well. Easy to sweep & clean. FYI Not flush to the floor. Just Slightly higher.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for keeping your footsies happy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the new mat. I've had a couple others, this one feels like an appropriate level of resilience for long standing in front of the kitchen sink or workbench. I bought the black color which is an attractive flat black with texturing. The backside is not sticky per se, but designed so that it won't slide for me on wood or tile. So far I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'2" and 210 pounds so I was hoping this would provide support for me. It is pretty big and allows me to move around staying on pad! Support is sufficient and much more comfortable than standing on carpeted floor at work so I am pleased with this mat so far. Hope long term durability is as good but it seems well made and no seams to rip down the road! Got the red one and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Color was not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great mat and was looking forward to having in my kitchen. I, however, have several red small appliances and accents. The picture showed it to be a true red, however, when I got it I was disappointed to find out that it was more of a burgundy or oxblood, rather the the red-red I was hoping for. It really would not compliment my color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: and are comfortable to walk and work on
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these mats, small size first, to protect the sink and stove areas on our new cork floor. The mats arrived quickly, lay flat, and are comfortable to walk and work on. Other reviewers mentioned that they slide around on the floor. Mine slide a little, but it's a minor issue. So far I've had the smaller mat for 3 months, and no sign of wear. I am completely satisfied with my Sky mats.
customer_reviews.author: LynnE

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my mat and put it by my kitchen sink. What a great product! We have tile floors and standing on “cement” sure makes your legs ache! My old mat was ok but the thickness of the Sky Mat is far superior! Now meal prep time will be easier on my legs.
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it, and using it as I type. I just started using a standing desk, so I was looking for a very cushy mat that would provide comfort for my heels (as I have a mild case of plantar fasciitis). So far, so good. My feet are happy, and so far, so is my back. Will let you know if the cushioning holds up as well as my kitchen gel mats.
customer_reviews.author: Sheltie Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. I use it with my stand up desk and notice a difference in my legs and feet. The size of the mat provides plenty of room to stand behind my desk. Was delivered quickly and in a flat box, keeping the mat in perfect shape. I have not experienced my mat "denting" or loosing it's shape after weeks of daily use. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Kujawa

customer_reviews.title: Looks good/ comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We have very hard tile floors in the kitchen and this works well at the sink, when chopping vegetables, any time I need to be at the stove for a while. Easy to move around the kitchen and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo lover

customer_reviews.title: I would cover every inch of my floor with this mat, given the opportunity.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat for my standing desk at work. It out-performs the GelPro version I used previously without question. It's more comfortable, has the right amount of flexibility and support, and thus far holds up better against wear than my previous mat. Coworkers who've had the opportunity to experience it remark that it's like standing on a cloud, which is true. 10/10 would buy again, and if it was socially appropriate to cover my entire home with this material, I would do so.
customer_reviews.author: mellymel

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The mat is awesome! We just moved into a house with tile flooring in the kitchen and hardwood everywhere else. My feet were killing me! This mat was immediate relief and amazing! We have had it about 2 weeks now and still love it! We also had a family get together and everyone commented on how great it was! Ordering a 2nd one for the stove area now! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kaele Albert

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust indigo blue description!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I already have an indigo blue mat in front of my sink that I love. But, obviously, I waited too long to order one for in front of my stove. I know I waited too long because even though the 20” x 32” says indigo blue, it’s actually a blue (darker) like the other sizes. So, if you’re looking for indigo blue, don’t trust the description!!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Very cushiony!!!
customer_reviews.text: This one has memory foam in it and they were very generous with it!!! Saves your feet and legs while cooking, etc. we are using it in front of the toilet to protect our floor that cracked after we just put it in!!! But this keeps that from getting worse and from showing! It cleans very easily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Savelberg

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mat for months now. It looks brand new, it is super easy to clean and very comfortable. It was thicker than I thought but since the edges are beveled you don't trip on it. I purchased the black one and looks very good on my modern kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as describes. Perfect depth to the mats, very supportive. I haven't had to clean them since I just got them; however, I would imagine they would be easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: J O Price

customer_reviews.title: works well for standing desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a standing desk at work and bought this to give me a little more comfort - works really well! It does show stains (from mud or spilled coffee!) but is easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: thanks for the great mat, my back pain is gone, i can stand in the kitchen for hours now. awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very comfortable. It has beveled edges which make it less of a trip hazard and it is very easy to clean. We haven't had it long enough to rate it's durability, but it looks and feels like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: You may be surprised! I was! This thing is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I really had NO IDEA just how much I would LOVE this when I ordered it! I spend a lot of time on my feet in the kitchen and this mat makes it so much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: TIM Talks Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Helping my husband's back!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the mat for my husband at his standing desk, and it's been helping keep his back happy and legs less fatigued. He's been using it for about a month, and it seems to be making a real difference for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. It is everything it says it is and more. The communication you get from the seller is worth the price of the mat! Everything else is gravy! My only issue is that I ordered a brown mat and I got a black one. I like the black one, though.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice mat. Perfect color and size and very thick and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ladonna Kay Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I thought this wouldn't really own up to my expectations and considered buying another right after my product shipped. But overall I really like this thing, thick, soft and exactly what I need as a 200+ lb male. Highly recommend. PS. I'm using this with a standing desk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh, so easy on the feet
customer_reviews.text: I wish my entire kitchen was covered with these mats. Great for placing in front of sink, stove, or any other area you spend a lot of time standing.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Standing Around Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Mat rests on floor by busy kitchen counter. It makes a huge difference on the feel of meal prep. Pleasant!!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesnowta

customer_reviews.title: Good functional ergonomic mat.
customer_reviews.text: I work at my computer in the standing position much of the time. This mat really makes a difference and allows me to stand without tiring. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Al, the Gadget Guy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy kitchen mats
customer_reviews.text: We just got these kitchen mats and are having a blast with their squishiness. They fell very durable and comfy, so I expect they'll last for a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Fast service
customer_reviews.text: The floor pad arrived fast and in great shape. It's comfy to stand on. I don't use it barefoot. The small one was large enough for my standing desk work space.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Toadvine

customer_reviews.title: Solid floor mat for a standing desk
customer_reviews.text: I've used a few different floor mats over the last four years for my standing desk. I had to replace my last standing floor after a few weeks of usage. I ordered this new mat and it arrived within a day or so. Great improvement! I've used it for a little over a week and my arches feel fantastic. The mat is also more durable than other products I've tried in the past. It easily withstood a spilled coffee and cat scratches. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Resnick

customer_reviews.title: I tried a mat once and I thought this was that kind- it's fine. I'm not upset with it but it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: It works all right. I tried a mat once and I thought this was that kind- it's fine. I'm not upset with it but it doesn't help as much as whatever the other brand is, but I'm not disappointed enough to deal with returning it. Fine product it arrived fine and in fine condition. I'll see how long it lasts. Its better than bare floor or my carpet so I consider it an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable when I get off work and I have to take my shoes off then I can work in the kitchen really does help my feet unfortunately it does slide after a while
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It fits right in front of the stove - neither too large nor too small. It's easy to clean which is a necessity since it catches grease spatters. And, of course, it's comfortable to stand on, especially if you have tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: mary bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds comes to mind....
customer_reviews.text: This mat is heaven for your feet. Very cushy but with support. I have only had this mat for 1 week but I am happy. I bought it for work and to go with my new desk riser so I can sit less throughout the day. This mat will then save your feet from prematurely getting tired while standing and working. Thank you Oasis.
customer_reviews.author: stonehengehorse

customer_reviews.title: This better get me a cheery tree.
customer_reviews.text: This mat was a little harder than I expected but it works really well. I'm able to stand for much longer than without it. Their cheesy messages asking for a review was also fun. I look forward to the cherry tree planted in my name.
customer_reviews.author: Karah

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out.
customer_reviews.text: I have the mat for less than a week, so I'm still evaluating. Give me a few weeks and I'll determine if it is making a difference
customer_reviews.author: POPEYE 59

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have this mat in front of our sink and it is GREAT. Super supportive yet comfortable. Highly recommend. Will update over time with how it keeps up.
customer_reviews.author: thiscaristooslow

customer_reviews.title: First review ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was driven to write this review because of the entertaining messages from Sky Solutions USA. It was clear that this company wants to make their customers happy and provide a great product for us to respond to. I do love my mat which makes the task of washing dishes a little less painful for my back and feet. Standing on my mat is far more preferable to the tile kitchen floor. Thanks for the sincere messages from my new best friends!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Herman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Use for a standing desk at the office. I like the edges as they incline, allowing me to have my heels off the back and feet slightly inclined for a different stance throughout the day if I prefer that. Looks nice, arrived nicely an dents from my heels (in shoes) disappear after standing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 and planning on a 4th so I have these in the 4 main standing areas in my kitchen. Super happy with how comfy these are and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Also works perfectly as a push-up matt.
customer_reviews.text: Gribs the floor firmly. You have to intentionally move it with your fingers if you need to. Also works perfectly as a push-up matt.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: solid and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these and so far, they're held up well. Comfortable to stand on, and don't move around once you lay them down.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief is incredible worth 10x the cost
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing I suffer from chronic back pain and lower lumbar arthritis and sometimes I just stand on it just for relief. It’s big but not bulky perfect for cooking and cleaning and just standing lol
customer_reviews.author: Alana watson

customer_reviews.title: I like it but my Roomba doesnt
customer_reviews.text: My roomba manages to get on top of these mats and then can't get off because it thinks it's on top of a table or something. Otherwise quite comfortable but just be aware if you have roomba in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure for kitchen...
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat itself, but seems less suited for kitchen use...maybe I'm just getting used to it. Product is good quality. When delivered...in a HUGE box, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: ExecSec

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Customer Care & Service - They Stick with You!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Way to go Sky Solutions!! Had a color mismatch between 2 different sizes Emily was fabulous! She exercised every imaginable option to satisfy my expectations rather than simply aborting the sale and refunding my money! Sky Solutions went above and beyond proving that customer care & service are job #1 for them. Way to go Emily and the Sky Solutions team.
customer_reviews.author: AJL

product_meta.title: Oasis Kitchen Mat, Comfort Anti Fatigue Mat, 5 Colors and 3 Sizes, Perfect for Kitchens and Standing Desks (20x32x3/4-Inch, Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:20x32x3/4-Inch#COMFORTABLE commercial grade thickness and stability for foot and knee comfort over long periods of time. 
#SAFE advanced beveled edge design to prevent tripping injury.
#ECO-FRIENDLY Highest quality materials with NO toxic off-gassing smell. 
#BEAUTIFUL modern style that will look wonderful in any office or home. 
#CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: We stand by and believe in our products 100%! If you have any problems with our Mats, contact us and we will find a solution together!
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE commercial grade thickness and stability for foot and knee comfort over long periods of time.
SAFE advanced beveled edge design to prevent tripping injury.
ECO-FRIENDLY Highest quality materials with NO toxic off-gassing smell.
BEAUTIFUL modern style that will look wonderful in any office or home.
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: We stand by and believe in our products 100%! If you have any problems with our Mats, contact us and we will find a solution together!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars952 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
